      • getAllBooksFiltered

        public org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Book> getAllBooksFiltered(int pageNumber,
                                                                      java.lang.String keyword)
        method to retrieve a list of books resulting after filtering and displayed with pagination.
        Parameters:
        pageNumber, - int to access to the number of Books Page to display.
        keyword, - keyword which the search is based on to filter elements in the list of books.
        Returns:
        Page of Book resulting after filtering.
